official_title: To provide for the conduct of basic research on certain matters relating to ovarian cancer.

summary.text: Ovarian Cancer Research Act of 1993 - Directs the Secretary of Health and Human Services, through the Director of the National Institutes of Health and the Director of the National Cancer Institute, to conduct or support basic research on certain aspects of ovarian cancer. Prohibits the Secretary from conducting or supporting clinical research on the same matters. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: To provide for the conduct of basic research on certain matters relating to ovarian cancer.
